alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 9:20PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN ITASCA AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM CDT... At 919 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Meadow Brook, to 8 miles north of Keewatin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Meadow Brook around 925 PM CDT. Chisholm around 930 PM CDT. Cook around 935 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Buhl, Lake Vermilion, Virginia and Mountain Iron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; North St. Louis
